title: Panel sync fix pattern
details:
When fixing panel sync issues:
1. Track state changes while panel is closed with a flag (stateChangedWhileClosed)
2. Refresh content on open if flag is set
3. Add storage.onChanged listener for cross-tab sync (check areaName === 'local' and key === 'quick_tabs_state_v2')
4. Remove setTimeout race conditions - rely on event listeners
5. Add defensive checks before calling manager methods
6. Always cleanup listeners in destroy()
